cheml.wrappers.ui.main.transform(blocks)¶
goals:
  • collect all sends and receives
  • check send and receive format.
  • make the computational graph
  • find the order of implementation of functions based on sends and receives
Parameters:cmls –
Return implementation order:

Module contents¶

The ‘cheml.wrappers.ui’ module provides a console user interface for the ChemML Wrapper, using Urwid library. last modified date: October, 05, 2017
